languages.text: По традиции Лорд-капитан должен занять почетное место на мостике. Леди Теодора мертва — только у ее преемни{mf|ка|цы} есть право встать там, где когда-то возвышалась она.

traits.locale_text: По традиции Лорд-капитан должен занять почетное место на мостике. Леди Теодора мертва — только у вас есть право встать там, где когда-то возвышалась она.

languages.text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.
languages.original_text: По традиции Лорд-капитан должен занять почетное место на мостике. Леди Теодора мертва — только у ее преемни{mf|ка|цы} есть право встать там, где когда-то возвышалась она.

traits.locale_text: It's customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.
It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.
It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

languages.text: Üblicherweise hat der Lord Captain das Kommando auf der Brücke. Lady Theodora ist tot – nur ihr Erbe hat das Recht, ihren Platz einzunehmen.
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: Üblicherweise hat der Lord Captain das Kommando auf der Brücke. Lady Theodora ist tot – nur ihr Erbe hat das Recht, ihren Platz einzunehmen.

languages.text: La coutume veut que tout seigneur-capitaine dirige son vaisseau depuis la passerelle. Dame Théodora étant morte, {mf|seul son héritier|seule son héritière} a le droit de la remplacer à la barre.
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: La coutume veut que tout seigneur-capitaine dirige son vaisseau depuis la passerelle. Dame Théodora étant morte, {mf|seul son héritier|seule son héritière} a le droit de la remplacer à la barre.

languages.text: 按照惯例，领主舰长必须出现在舰桥上。西奥多拉夫人死了，只有她的继承人才有权接替她的位置。
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: 按照惯例，领主舰长必须出现在舰桥上。西奥多拉夫人死了，只有她的继承人才有权接替她的位置。

languages.text: ブリッジではロード・キャプテンが指揮を執るのが慣例だ。レディー・シオドーラが亡くなった今、舵を取る権利を持つのは彼女の後継者だけだ。
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: ブリッジではロード・キャプテンが指揮を執るのが慣例だ。レディー・シオドーラが亡くなった今、舵を取る権利を持つのは彼女の後継者だけだ。

languages.text: Es tradicional que el Lord Capitán de una nave presida desde el puente. Lady Theodora ha muerto, por lo que solo su hereder{mf|o|a} tiene derecho a ocupar su puesto al timón.
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: Es tradicional que el Lord Capitán de una nave presida desde el puente. Lady Theodora ha muerto, por lo que solo su hereder{mf|o|a} tiene derecho a ocupar su puesto al timón.

languages.text: Köprüde Lord Kaptan'ın başkanlık etmesi adettendir. Leydi Theodora öldü. Sadece vârisi onun yerine dümene geçme hakkına sahiptir.
languages.original_text: It is customary for the Lord Captain to preside on the bridge. Lady Theodora is dead — only her heir possesses the right to take her place at the helm.

traits.locale_text: Köprüde Lord Kaptan'ın başkanlık etmesi adettendir. Leydi Theodora öldü. Sadece vârisi onun yerine dümene geçme hakkına sahiptir.
